post.title: Man Who Agrees With The Media, Universities, Corporations, And Hollywood Thinks He's Part Of The Resistance | The Babylon Bee

body:
Listen here you liberal piece of shit, there is ABSOLUTELY NO DIFFERENCE between left and right. They are both imperialist scum - just that the left wants the loot from imperialism more equally distributed. Throughout the history of the USA, there was only peace for 9 out of god knows how long years. The USA is a warmonger nation from start to finish.

Ask yourself this question before you vote out Trump: which country has the most military bases in the world? It's the fucking JEW-S-A.
